Plot: When Piglet comes up missing his Hundred Acre Wood friends use Piglet's own Book of Memories to find him, discovering along the way just how big a role he's played in their lives.
Title: Piglet's Big Movie
Writer: Brian Hohlfeld (screenplay), A.A. Milne (books), Ted Henning (additional screenplay material)
Actors: John Fiedler, Jim Cummings, Andre Stojka, Kath Soucie
tomatoConsensus: Wholesome and charming entertainment for young children.
